org.js4ms.rest.entity

Class StringEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.js4ms.rest.entity.RawEntity
      • org.js4ms.rest.entity.StringEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Entity

    public class StringEntity
extends RawEntity
    An RTSP or HTTP request/response entity whose content is retrieved from a String.
    Author:
    Gregory Bumgardner

      • Fields inherited from interface org.js4ms.rest.entity.Entity

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StringEntity(String content)
      Constructs an entity from the specified String that will produce a Content Type header value of text/plain and charset of ISO-8859-1.
      StringEntity(StringBuffer content)
      Constructs an entity from the specified String that will produce a Content Type header value of text/plain and charset of ISO-8859-1.
      StringEntity(StringBuffer content, String contentType)
      Constructs an entity from the specified String that will produce a Content Type header value set to the specified content type and charset of ISO-8859-1.
      StringEntity(StringBuffer content, String contentType, String characterSet, boolean addCharset)
      Constructs an entity from the specified String that will produce a Content Type header value set to the specified content type and an optional charset parameter set to the specified character set name.
      StringEntity(String content, String contentType)
      Constructs an entity from the specified String that will produce a Content Type header value set to the specified content type and charset of ISO-8859-1.
      StringEntity(String content, String contentType, String characterSet, boolean addCharset)
      Constructs an entity from the specified String that will produce a Content Type header value set to the specified content type and an optional charset parameter set to the specified character set name.

      • StringEntity

        public StringEntity(String content,
            String contentType,
            String characterSet,
            boolean addCharset)
             throws IllegalArgumentException
        Constructs an entity from the specified String that will produce a Content Type header value set to the specified content type and an optional charset parameter set to the specified character set name. The charset parameter is only added to the Content Type header if the addCharset parameter is true.
        Parameters:
        content - - The entity content.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException

      • StringEntity

        public StringEntity(StringBuffer content,
            String contentType,
            String characterSet,
            boolean addCharset)
             throws IllegalArgumentException
        Constructs an entity from the specified String that will produce a Content Type header value set to the specified content type and an optional charset parameter set to the specified character set name. The charset parameter is only added to the Content Type header if the addCharset parameter is true.
        Parameters:
        content - - The entity content.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException

      • getContentLength

        public int getContentLength()
        Description copied from class: RawEntity
        Returns the content length of the entity. Used to set the value of the Content-Length message header. Returns -1 if no length was specified.
        Specified by:
        getContentLength in interface Entity
        Overrides:
        getContentLength in class RawEntity
